comments.body: @leo-da We're just a little more explicit that the contents of the argument are ignored, now. How does this sound to you?

I should have removed this `main`... It was supposed to be the tool to generate keys for the JWT, but I don't think we are using it right now.

In any case regarding the `case Some(Config(None, Some(GenerateJwt(Some(publicKey @ _), Some(privateKey @ _)))))`
you can still used `publicKey` and `privateKey` values, right? Nothing prevents you from this. Why not just use `_` instead. But it reads better like `publicKey @ _`, kind of self-documenting.
When you don't use a pattern variable, `-Ywarn-unused` suggests this form, for exactly the reason you say.
